title: Journalism actually shows up
description: Steve Jobs used to say that a brand is like a bank account. When you build trust through quality work, you’re making deposits in the value of your brand, while negative experiences with your creations are withdrawals. If your balance gets too low, you’re done for. In so much of our industry, we’ve spent years...
